1. City Council

City Council
============

The Portland City Council has seven members - a Mayor and six Council Members.

**![Mayor Cathy Skurow photo](https://www.portlandtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=5264)
Mayor Cathy Skurow**
(Term expires 2026)
Four as Mayor
Eight as a Council Member
(Three of those as Mayor Pro Tem)
[**Email**](mailto:cathy.skurow@portlandtx.gov)
[: Cathy.Skurow@PortlandTX.gov](mailto:Cathy.Skurow@PortlandTX.gov)

Portland operates under the council / manager form of municipal government. With this structure, the City Council and Mayor are elected by the citizens, and the City Council and Mayor hire a professional administrator, known as the
[city manager](https://www.portlandtx.gov/90/City-Managers-Office "city manager")
(link), to execute council policy and manage the day-to-day operations of the city.
